Define Cheesey Pizza and Classify
Define a Cheesey Pizza, as a Pizza 
that has some cheese on it
Use the reasoner to help us produce a polyhierarchy
without having to assert multiple parents
•
Usual steps
–
Create primitive classes and then migrate them to 
defined classes
–
All the defined pizzas will be direct subclasses of 
Pizza
–
So, we create a CheesyPizza Class (do not make it 
disjoint) and add a restriction:
“Every CheeseyPizza must have at least one 
CheeseTopping”
